features.EOS: 04 is a Radar Imaging Satellite designed to provide high quality images under all weather conditions for applications such as Agriculture, Forestry & Plantations, Soil Moisture & Hydrology and Flood mapping. प्रमोचक राकेट / Launch Vehicle: PSLV-C52/EOS-04 Mission उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation अनुप्रयोग / Application: Earth Observation More Details PSLV-C52/EOS-04 Mission EOS-04 INS-2TD INSPIREsat-1 Brochure PDF - 7.17 MB Gallery Launch of PSLV-C52/EOS-04 PSLV-C52 Liftoff and Onboard Camera View
